question: Your company uses Salesforce for customer relationship management (CRM). ServiceNow for IT service management, and a Cloud SQL database to store customer transaction data You need to seamlessly connect, map. and transform data between these systems to ensure data consistency and enable real-time reporting. You want to follow Google-recommended practices. What should you do?

options.text: Leverage Workflows to connect the services and transform the data.
Leverage Application Integration to connect the services and transform the data.
Leverage Pub/Sub and BigQuery to connect the services and transform the data.
Leverage Pub/Sub and Datastream to connect the services and transform the data.
